extendedInfo.description: Friendcaster offers a beautiful interface, lots of unique features and push notifications.includingâ¦â¨â Full news feedâ¨â Quick access to posting status updates, photos and videosâ Comment on and like postsâ¨â Zip It - hide posts by user or applicationâ Saved Posts - save your favorite posts to check out again later â¨â Six beautiful themesâ¨â View your friends check-ins, either in a list or mapâ¨â Displays your full size cover photo on the app opening screenâ¨â Support for multiple accountsâ¨â Hi-res photos directly in the news feedâ¨â Quick and easy setup assistant for notificationsâ¨â Designed specifically for Android

reviews.title: OK App
reviews.comment: This app used to be pretty darn good but now, all I ever see are posts with pictures. When my friends make a post, I never see it, even if I go to their profile page. Still usable but I also have to use the original FB app to see what friends are up to.
reviews.author: Eric Parola

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: It is say that i have to re-log in....but, how can i log in if your notification keep appear om my screen and make me can\'t do typing. Plus, it make g tab 2 become lagging.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Piece of Cr*p
reviews.comment: Ad keeps popping up and kicks you out of your time line. Then you have to scroll all the way through to get to where you were again. Can\'t get back to any older posts. By old I mean today this am.
reviews.author: Joe Weiss

reviews.title: Definetely better than official fb app ..
reviews.comment: Its working .. its beautiful .. does not consume battery .. small footprint ..  notification no longrr work ..
reviews.author: Kelly Zan

reviews.title: Droid 4
reviews.comment: I really do like this app...it could use some touch ups here and there but no problem for me...and for that ...four stars my friend.
reviews.author: faye byrd

reviews.title: Fatal floor and glaring omission .
reviews.comment: No display of photos in private messages. Why? Even the most basic of FB apps have this feature ... And Friendcastet still has a crippling problem of posts missing from Newsfeed. \"Users block Friendcastet\' we\'re told. Spurious excuse! Frirndcaster is the only FB app that has this problem - the ONLY one, and I\'ve been through them all. If a whole lot of friends posts are missing from Newsfeed then the app becomes redundant.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Horrible app
reviews.comment: Always force closes! It\'s getting really annoying! Any way you could fix this? I\'m about to delete this crappy app! Horrible!!!!!
reviews.author: Beth Patton

reviews.title: Notifications don\'t work
reviews.comment: I used this just for notifications. I had it set for periodic polling. After a while it just stopped working. Once every few days it would give me a notification but the rest of the time I would log in and see a bunch of stuff that it hadn\'t notified me about.
reviews.author: Jean-Marc Robert

reviews.title: Much better than official fb
reviews.comment: But the push notifications still need work. I have the Kyocera rise by virgin mobile. Push notifications were working but the stopped. Only got notified when I went into app
reviews.author: Milly A.

reviews.title: Broken!
reviews.comment: Notifications are broken again. Attempting to post just yeilds \"invalid response errors\". Every update just introduces more bugs. Friendcaster is useless except as a read-only viewer. Uninstalling .
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No longer able to use the app.
reviews.comment: Worked ok until it started saying I needed to re-logon. I couldn\'t logon again because the error message covers the keyboard. No choice but to force quit and uninstall
reviews.author: Jill Valentine

reviews.title: Can\'t like Comments on statuses - Cannot Poke?
reviews.comment: Can\'t like comments to my own status posts. \'share\' isn\'t working properly: my option is set to pull up a list of apps, but when sharing pictures or status updates. It posts directly to FC. I get notifications that I have been poked; however, I don\'t have the option to poke back.... irritating. Can\'t find how to like pages?!?... kind of important. Also, the zip feature would be more useful if you could zip certain words or phrases instead of just individual users, pages, or apps (like Tweetcaster)
reviews.author: Kristy Lytle

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy Note 2
reviews.comment: Freezes my phone! I have to reset it every time I try to start your app. No other app I have does this. It did it again! Even after the update. Pathetic.
reviews.author: Lance Mansfield

reviews.title: Great app but one small issue...
reviews.comment: This is an awesome app for sure except for the fact that when I try to like comments that are made to my status, it will not let me. When I try to do this, it keeps giving me an error message and asks me to log out and log back in. I do this a few times and it gives me the same message each time.
reviews.author: Alice S

reviews.title: KEEP RE-LOG IN
reviews.comment: this is so annoying. why this happend? bugs maybe?
reviews.author: Erin Nofi Dharmayanti

reviews.title: Invalid Log Out
reviews.comment: Every time I go to the app it says invalid log out then I log out only to have invalid pop up again and again this app use to rock but now its sucks I am switching to another app asap.
reviews.author: Chris Joffrion

reviews.title: Nexus user
reviews.comment: The idea appears to be better than the original Facebook app. I actually wanna rate it 4.25 stars. One thing that needs to be fixed is login/network errors after being on it for a few minutes. Not sure who\'s end that is on yet. I hope to replace my Facebook and messenger app. Reason: users do not like to have 2 fb apps eating up ram
reviews.author: Joey Crook

reviews.title: Still crap
reviews.comment: Ok, my Facebook session has become invalid. Whatever. I\'d be happy to log back in, if only the popup notification telling me this weren\'t permanently displayed OVER THE KEYBOARD making typing impossible. I have to force-close the app to get rid of it. And there still isn\'t a way to share another user\'s photo. There\'s the option, but it takes you to the photo page where you can tag, make it your profile pic, or download it.  But still no sharing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Almost great!
reviews.comment: Love the color choice, and the new photos of friends function! Also having the favourite friends in a new slide also its awesome! BUT THE APP ITS VERY UNSTABLE, NO FULL ACCESS FOR BASIC THINGS.. I DOUBT IN THE PRO IS ANY DIFFERENT.  4/5 Cause I need to still use FB own app and this one is just for thoes mentioned features in the beginning!
reviews.author: Carlos D. Arrieta

reviews.comment: Superb its verry nice......\nFinally i found..
reviews.author: A Google User
